Package server

Class Generator

java.lang.Object
server.Generator
public class Generator
extends java.lang.Object
Generator is a class which allows to generate classes with students and the marks
Version:
1.0
Author:
Romain DUBUC

    static double generateMark()

      subject - The subject to use to add marks
      a_class - The student's class

    • generateMark

      public static double generateMark()
      Generate a mark relative to a gaussian, average : 13 | standard deviation : 3
      Returns:
      (double) the mark
